roleset.name: To obstruct or block an opening

role.descr: Secondary predication, Arg1 stopped from what

roles.note: In adjective form, use arg 0 over arg 3 when in doubt.

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: Blocking all excitatory synaptic activity had similar effects, and it occluded the effects of dendrotoxin, suggesting that activity levels regulate Id.

example.name: Adjective example
example.text: The right posterior tibial artery may be occluded by plaque.

example.name: Another adj example with arg 0
example.text: The common femoral artery is nearly completely occluded with calcified atheromatous disease.
